text: @realDonaldTrump Because of your EGO, YOU will go down as the biggest liar & dumbest president in our nations history - I can't wait for the stupidity of your presidency to end. YOU should NOT use COVID-19 in your defense on ANYTHING. You think more about VOTES then you do about the PEOPLE DYING.
